column1: Daily Weather Observations for Bathurst, New South Wales for December 2024
Prepared at 05:36 UTC on Thursday  5 December 2024   IDCJDW2012.202412
Most observations from Bathurst, but some from Bathurst Airport.
Temperature, humidity, cloud, evaporation and rainfall observations are from Bathurst Agricultural Station {station 063005}
Wind and pressure observations are from Bathurst Airport AWS {station 063291}
